title: sotelorene
author: sotelorene
content: Mohbad was signed/employed by Marlians Record ( a music record label in Nigeria whose CEO is Naira Marley). Though investigation is still ongoing, reports making rounds on the internet have it that, all attempt by Mohbad ( the signee) to terminate the contract between himself and marlians record was resisted. With your knowledge of the regulatory framework of employer/employee relationship. Discuss the concept of notice in employment relationship. Who can terminate the contract of employment? Can a notice to terminate a contract of employment be rejected? Can a notice by the employee to terminate a contract if employment be withdrawn? Please make we discusse
